DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to correlate phenotype and genotype of Down syndrome patients in order to identify the biochemical reactions involved in their mental retardation and their other phenotypic characteristics.
DOC.brief_title: Correlations Phenotype / Genotype in Down Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Down syndrome patients age: 8years and older assessment by the psychometric tests possible blood tests no exclusion criteria
